text: Lien Chan (; born 27 August 1936) is a Taiwanese politician. He was the Chairman of the Taiwan Provincial Government from 1990 to 1993, Premier of the Republic of China from 1993 to 1997, Vice President of Taiwan from 1996 to 2000, and was the Chairman of the Kuomintang (KMT) from 2000 to 2005. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of the Republic of China on Taiwan Category:Vice presidents of the Republic of China on Taiwan
title: Lien Chan
